metadata.synopsis: The duergar reacts to some deep rothe (bull-like creatures) turning hostile.

0.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
0.text: Bloody rothé have lost it - put 'em down!
0.context: NodeContext: Row-thay. Reacting to some bull-like animals turning hostile. Jargh - fool. ZHARG!

1.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
1.text: Bloody rothé have lost it. Put 'em down - and the jargh, too!
1.context: NodeContext: Row-thay. Reacting to some bull-like animals turning hostile. Jargh - fool. ZHARG!
